add_library(SparseMatMul SHARED SparseMatMul.cpp)
set_property(TARGET SparseMatMul PROPERTY POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE ON)
target_link_libraries(SparseMatMul ${TF_LIB_FILE})

file(MAKE_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/build)
set_target_properties(SparseMatMul PROPERTIES LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/build RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELEASE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/build)
